abstract: A federal judge stopped publication in the United States of a book by a Swedish author that contains a 76-year-old version of the protagonist of “The Catcher in the Rye.”
snippet: A federal judge stopped publication in the United States of a book by a Swedish author that contains a 76-year-old version of the protagonist of “The Catcher in the Rye.”
lead_paragraph: In a victory for the reclusive writer J. D. Salinger, a federal judge on Tuesday banned publication in the United States of a new book by a Swedish author that contains a 76-year-old version of Holden Caulfield, the protagonist of “The Catcher in the Rye.”

headline.main: Judge Rules for Salinger in Copyright Suit
